name: load-graph.py
description: Load sequences into the compressible graph format plus optional tagset.

options.description: show program's version number and exit
show this help message and exit
approximate number of unique kmers in the input set (default: 0)
Override the automatic FP rate setting for the current script (default: None)
maximum amount of memory to use for data structure (default: None)
Number of simultaneous threads to execute (default: 1)

Overwrite output file if it exists (default: False)
